title: Devasena Kundan Haaram - Regal Splendor
materials: 22K Gold Plated Base Metal with Hyderabadi Polish
features: Intricately designed with a floral pattern studded with sparkling Kundan stones. Adorned with ruby and emerald simulants within each floral motif. The centerpiece features a majestic pendant with delicate filigree work. Embellished with hanging pearl beads, providing a touch of traditional charm. The Haaram showcases a classic South Indian design, perfect for brides and festive occasions. Floral units are individual and linked together for a natural feel.
colors: Cream (Pearls). The classic combination of red
and gold signifies prosperity and auspiciousness.
occasions: and cultural events. Perfect for brides
and anyone looking to add a touch of South Indian elegance to their attire. Suitable for Muhurtham
description: This Kundan Haaram is a timeless piece that embodies the rich heritage of South Indian jewelry. The meticulous craftsmanship and high-quality materials ensure its durability and lasting beauty. It's not just jewelry; it's an heirloom piece to be cherished for generations. The Hyderabadi polish gives it a distinctive, antique look. The combination of traditional and modern elements makes it versatile for various occasions.
